process.title: Finishing & Delivery
process.desc: Hemmed, grommeted, or mounted and shipped.

faq.q: What resolution do I need for large format printing?
faq.a: For banners viewed at distance (6+ feet), 150 DPI at final print size is sufficient. For close-view signage, 300 DPI is recommended.
Yes. We use UV-resistant, weather-proof inks on outdoor-rated vinyl. Grommets are standard.

faq.q: Can you print trade show backdrops?
faq.a: Yes. We offer tension fabric pop-up displays, step-and-repeat backdrops, and curved display systems.

faq.q: What is the turnaround for large format?
faq.a: Standard is 3–5 business days. Rush 24–48 hour options available for most products.
